name: Night cream
versioning: Almond blossom- for dry & sensitive skin
title: Kneipp · Night cream · Almond blossom- for dry & sensitive skin
description: Kneipp Night cream Almond blossom- for dry & sensitive skin

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Panthenol, C10-18 Triglycerides,Octyldodecanol, Sorbitan Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Phytosterols, Echium PlantagineumSeed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Flower Extract, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/Leaf/Vine Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin,Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, p-Anisic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Helianthus Annuus Hybrid Oil, Sorbitan Oleate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: Particularly rich, the regenerative night cream softens wrinkles resulting from dryness. The skin is pleasantly smooth and supple in the morning. With precious almond oil and nourishing shea butter.
